title: cool 2 week ban
body: Cause my renekton talked shit the entire game and i stood up against him,.,. GG rito.. Guess i will be uninstalling your game seeing he prob went unpunished,,,,, w/e i am so done with the way you guys treat players sometimes...

replies.body:
Retaliation is not an acceptable reason to get toxic to other players; all that does is make the problem worse, and the other players now have to deal with another toxic player when they are just trying to play the game.

You don't need to "stand up for yourself", it doesn't improve the situation and they don't really care or they might be *wanting* to get that reaction from you. The only defense against toxic chat is Muting them. You can find the chat and ping mute buttons on the Scoreboard (default Tab) next to the individual's name. Chat muting prevents you from seeing their chat any longer so that you can focus on the game.

At the end of the match, simply report them for their behavior so that Riot can review their behavior and punish them appropriately.

> Cause my renekton talked shit the entire game and i stood up against him

The more severe of the games given in your reform card didn't have a Renekton in there at all. You were getting mad at someone for playing an 'ez mode champion'. Your penalty has nothing to do with other people, and is entirely related to your own behavior.

>  w/e i am so done with the way you guys treat players sometimes...

You were harassing players. If people harassed you, they would be subject to the same treatment.

Uh, i don't see why the downvotes? He clearly talked shit and never got banned for it, but for some reason DemiGorx did.

Punishments are based on **severity** and **frequency**. If *Player A* and *B* do the same thing and only *Player A* is punished, chances are it's because *Player A* has a long history of negative behavior while *Player B* does not.

* There's no such thing as a 24-hour ban
* Counter-attack is not defending yourself
* Multiple reports don't trigger punishments faster. Infact, it is treated the same way as 1 report.
* If you are toxic enough, Riot does indeed want you out of the game. But hey! At least you have time to reform right now.

You didn't stand up to him. You played right into his grubby little hands. Doesn't matter if what he said was a croc of bull. Get it? Croc? Haha.
